# Math Test Document

This document tests MathJax rendering in PDF conversion.

## Inline Math

The famous equation is $E = mc^2$, which relates energy and mass.

Pythagorean theorem: $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$

## Display Math

The Gaussian integral:

$$
\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi}
$$

Euler's identity:

$$
e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0
$$

## Matrix

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
a & b \\
c & d
\end{bmatrix}
$$

## Summation

$$
\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^2} = \frac{\pi^2}{6}
$$
